author: Axel Majes

author: ribena

text: @Markell1991 I was never a big fan of Sturm.  I kind of like the direction that Hawke has been hinting that Black Hole stands for something else other than the selfish personal goals of Sturm and Von Bolt.  I would prefer a new primary villain that exemplifies the chaotic nature of Black Hole but fights with real purpose.  Fight to bring chaos, chaos brings change, change brings progress, and progress brings hope for a renewed future.  I think the Allied Forces would have a great deal more trouble fighting a foe that has real purpose, even if they don't agree with it.
author: Axel Majes

text: It's a shame we're not getting a new AW. I'd love to see the triumphant return of Darth Octorok and company. (Admit it, that's definitely what Sturm reminds you of.)

author: wiegraf9009

text: It's (almost) criminal that a fine game like this didn't see the commercial light of day! The GBA could have REALLY used games like this! World Reborn would have made the Top 10 Best GBA Games for sure! I hope NeoPong decides to pick up World Reborn: Unification and try their luck in the NDS gaming market again! I hope they'd have much more luck in the future!
author: Yohko86

text: NeoPong started production on this game back in '03 or '04 for the GBA but things happened and this game never saw a commercial release (they also had announced a sequel for the NDS back in '05 called World Reborn: Unification but that was canceled not soon after) so NeoPong decided to release it as a free download on their site...but it seems that their site is now defunct. Fortunately I was able to download the game from EurAsia(dot)nu (you have to register first)!
author: Yohko86
